name: Flappy Bird DX Director's Cut
description:
Based off of Sonic Adventure DX Director's Cut.

This port of iconic game 'Flappy Bird' aims to give players a new reason to quit living, by giving a worse package as a whole! 

I literally made this in 3 days, check the 'devlog' folder for more information about development.

Update:

Flappy Bird Score Attack is a new version where you will be able to play against yourself. Same install instructions for the other game. 

Source for the games: https://github.com/khmpickles/Flappy-Bird/tree/main/Raylib
